title: “Every Battle … Shall Be with Burning”
html:
The prophet wrote in this chapter of Christ’s coming as “a great light” (v. 2), His first appearance, and as a “burning” (v. 5), the cleansing and destruction by fire that will accompany His coming in glory (seeIsaiah 9:5b).

LDS Church Educational System Old Testament Student Manual, 1 Kings–Malachi, Religion 302, Chapter 13, Item 53
